question: The Members of Parliament Local Area Development (MPLAD) Scheme is implemented by which Union ministry?
option3: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
option4: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
answer: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation
explanation:
The Union Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation implements the Members of Parliament Local Area Development (MPLAD) Scheme.
As per the ministry’s latest notification, the Members of Parliament can use the funds allotted to them under the MPLAD scheme to buy testing kits and other medical equipment needed to fight coronavirus pandemic. ₹5 crore is given to every member of the Rajya Sabha and the Lok Sabha, per year under the MPLAD scheme to use for developing the community.
